abilities.name: Self-Imprisonment
abilities.description: Can't attack. Your other units have -1/-0

abilities.name: Breaking Free
abilities.description: When you play 3 spells in one turn, destroy this and summon an 8/8 Freedom token

body.raw:
# Eight of Swords

Bound and blindfolded, trapped by swords - but the prison is of the mind.

*"The strongest chains are those we forge ourselves."*
